sqlMap.select:
select CHNLDOCID, CHANNELID, DOCID, DOCTITLE, DOCORDER, DOCSTATUS, CRUSER, CRTIME, DOCPUBTIME, DOCPUBURL, DOCORDERPRI, INVALIDTIME, DELUSER, DELTIME, MODAL, DOCRELTIME, DOCCHANNEL, DOCFLAG, DOCKIND, SITEID, SRCSITEID, LIFESTATUS, DOCCRUSER, HITSCOUNT, COMMENTCOUNT, COLLECTCOUNT, CRUSERID, COMPLETESCORE, CRYSCORE, ALLSCORE, TRANSCOUNT, INFORMTYPE, DOCSCORE from IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK
order by $orderByClause$

select CHNLDOCID, CHANNELID, DOCID, DOCTITLE, DOCORDER, DOCSTATUS, CRUSER, CRTIME, DOCPUBTIME, DOCPUBURL, DOCORDERPRI, INVALIDTIME, DELUSER, DELTIME, MODAL, DOCRELTIME, DOCCHANNEL, DOCFLAG, DOCKIND, SITEID, SRCSITEID, LIFESTATUS, DOCCRUSER, HITSCOUNT, COMMENTCOUNT, COLLECTCOUNT, CRUSERID, COMPLETESCORE, CRYSCORE, ALLSCORE, TRANSCOUNT, INFORMTYPE, DOCSCORE from IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK where CHNLDOCID = #chnldocid:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK (CHNLDOCID, CHANNELID, DOCID, DOCTITLE, DOCORDER, DOCSTATUS, CRUSER, CRTIME, DOCPUBTIME, DOCPUBURL, DOCORDERPRI, INVALIDTIME, DELUSER, DELTIME, MODAL, DOCRELTIME, DOCCHANNEL, DOCFLAG, DOCKIND, SITEID, SRCSITEID, LIFESTATUS, DOCCRUSER, HITSCOUNT, COMMENTCOUNT, COLLECTCOUNT, CRUSERID, COMPLETESCORE, CRYSCORE, ALLSCORE, TRANSCOUNT, INFORMTYPE, DOCSCORE) values (#chnldocid:DECIMAL#, #channelid:DECIMAL#, #docid:DECIMAL#, #doctitle:VARCHAR#, #docorder:DECIMAL#, #docstatus:DECIMAL#, #cruser:VARCHAR#, #crtime:TIMESTAMP#, #docpubtime:TIMESTAMP#, #docpuburl:VARCHAR#, #docorderpri:DECIMAL#, #invalidtime:TIMESTAMP#, #deluser:VARCHAR#, #deltime:TIMESTAMP#, #modal:DECIMAL#, #docreltime:TIMESTAMP#, #docchannel:DECIMAL#, #docflag:DECIMAL#, #dockind:DECIMAL#, #siteid:DECIMAL#, #srcsiteid:DECIMAL#, #lifestatus:DECIMAL#, #doccruser:VARCHAR#, #hitscount:DECIMAL#, #commentcount:DECIMAL#, #collectcount:DECIMAL#, #cruserid:DECIMAL#, #completescore:DECIMAL#, #cryscore:DECIMAL#, #allscore:DECIMAL#, #transcount:DECIMAL#, #informtype:DECIMAL#, #docscore:DECIMAL#)

sqlMap.select: select count(*) from IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK
sqlMap.update:
update IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK
CHNLDOCID = #record.chnldocid:DECIMAL#
CHANNELID = #record.channelid:DECIMAL#
DOCID = #record.docid:DECIMAL#
DOCTITLE = #record.doctitle:VARCHAR#
DOCORDER = #record.docorder:DECIMAL#
DOCSTATUS = #record.docstatus:DECIMAL#
CRUSER = #record.cruser:VARCHAR#
CRTIME = #record.crtime:TIMESTAMP#
DOCPUBTIME = #record.docpubtime:TIMESTAMP#
DOCPUBURL = #record.docpuburl:VARCHAR#
DOCORDERPRI = #record.docorderpri:DECIMAL#
INVALIDTIME = #record.invalidtime:TIMESTAMP#
DELUSER = #record.deluser:VARCHAR#
DELTIME = #record.deltime:TIMESTAMP#
MODAL = #record.modal:DECIMAL#
DOCRELTIME = #record.docreltime:TIMESTAMP#
DOCCHANNEL = #record.docchannel:DECIMAL#
DOCFLAG = #record.docflag:DECIMAL#
DOCKIND = #record.dockind:DECIMAL#
SITEID = #record.siteid:DECIMAL#
SRCSITEID = #record.srcsiteid:DECIMAL#
LIFESTATUS = #record.lifestatus:DECIMAL#
DOCCRUSER = #record.doccruser:VARCHAR#
HITSCOUNT = #record.hitscount:DECIMAL#
COMMENTCOUNT = #record.commentcount:DECIMAL#
COLLECTCOUNT = #record.collectcount:DECIMAL#
CRUSERID = #record.cruserid:DECIMAL#
COMPLETESCORE = #record.completescore:DECIMAL#
CRYSCORE = #record.cryscore:DECIMAL#
ALLSCORE = #record.allscore:DECIMAL#
TRANSCOUNT = #record.transcount:DECIMAL#
INFORMTYPE = #record.informtype:DECIMAL#
DOCSCORE = #record.docscore:DECIMAL#

update IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK set CHNLDOCID = #record.chnldocid:DECIMAL#, CHANNELID = #record.channelid:DECIMAL#, DOCID = #record.docid:DECIMAL#, DOCTITLE = #record.doctitle:VARCHAR#, DOCORDER = #record.docorder:DECIMAL#, DOCSTATUS = #record.docstatus:DECIMAL#, CRUSER = #record.cruser:VARCHAR#, CRTIME = #record.crtime:TIMESTAMP#, DOCPUBTIME = #record.docpubtime:TIMESTAMP#, DOCPUBURL = #record.docpuburl:VARCHAR#, DOCORDERPRI = #record.docorderpri:DECIMAL#, INVALIDTIME = #record.invalidtime:TIMESTAMP#, DELUSER = #record.deluser:VARCHAR#, DELTIME = #record.deltime:TIMESTAMP#, MODAL = #record.modal:DECIMAL#, DOCRELTIME = #record.docreltime:TIMESTAMP#, DOCCHANNEL = #record.docchannel:DECIMAL#, DOCFLAG = #record.docflag:DECIMAL#, DOCKIND = #record.dockind:DECIMAL#, SITEID = #record.siteid:DECIMAL#, SRCSITEID = #record.srcsiteid:DECIMAL#, LIFESTATUS = #record.lifestatus:DECIMAL#, DOCCRUSER = #record.doccruser:VARCHAR#, HITSCOUNT = #record.hitscount:DECIMAL#, COMMENTCOUNT = #record.commentcount:DECIMAL#, COLLECTCOUNT = #record.collectcount:DECIMAL#, CRUSERID = #record.cruserid:DECIMAL#, COMPLETESCORE = #record.completescore:DECIMAL#, CRYSCORE = #record.cryscore:DECIMAL#, ALLSCORE = #record.allscore:DECIMAL#, TRANSCOUNT = #record.transcount:DECIMAL#, INFORMTYPE = #record.informtype:DECIMAL#, DOCSCORE = #record.docscore:DECIMAL#

update IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK
CHANNELID = #channelid:DECIMAL#
DOCID = #docid:DECIMAL#
DOCTITLE = #doctitle:VARCHAR#
DOCORDER = #docorder:DECIMAL#
DOCSTATUS = #docstatus:DECIMAL#
CRUSER = #cruser:VARCHAR#
CRTIME = #crtime:TIMESTAMP#
DOCPUBTIME = #docpubtime:TIMESTAMP#
DOCPUBURL = #docpuburl:VARCHAR#
DOCORDERPRI = #docorderpri:DECIMAL#
INVALIDTIME = #invalidtime:TIMESTAMP#
DELUSER = #deluser:VARCHAR#
DELTIME = #deltime:TIMESTAMP#
MODAL = #modal:DECIMAL#
DOCRELTIME = #docreltime:TIMESTAMP#
DOCCHANNEL = #docchannel:DECIMAL#
DOCFLAG = #docflag:DECIMAL#
DOCKIND = #dockind:DECIMAL#
SITEID = #siteid:DECIMAL#
SRCSITEID = #srcsiteid:DECIMAL#
LIFESTATUS = #lifestatus:DECIMAL#
DOCCRUSER = #doccruser:VARCHAR#
HITSCOUNT = #hitscount:DECIMAL#
COMMENTCOUNT = #commentcount:DECIMAL#
COLLECTCOUNT = #collectcount:DECIMAL#
CRUSERID = #cruserid:DECIMAL#
COMPLETESCORE = #completescore:DECIMAL#
CRYSCORE = #cryscore:DECIMAL#
ALLSCORE = #allscore:DECIMAL#
TRANSCOUNT = #transcount:DECIMAL#
INFORMTYPE = #informtype:DECIMAL#
DOCSCORE = #docscore:DECIMAL#
where CHNLDOCID = #chnldocid:DECIMAL#

update IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK set CHANNELID = #channelid:DECIMAL#, DOCID = #docid:DECIMAL#, DOCTITLE = #doctitle:VARCHAR#, DOCORDER = #docorder:DECIMAL#, DOCSTATUS = #docstatus:DECIMAL#, CRUSER = #cruser:VARCHAR#, CRTIME = #crtime:TIMESTAMP#, DOCPUBTIME = #docpubtime:TIMESTAMP#, DOCPUBURL = #docpuburl:VARCHAR#, DOCORDERPRI = #docorderpri:DECIMAL#, INVALIDTIME = #invalidtime:TIMESTAMP#, DELUSER = #deluser:VARCHAR#, DELTIME = #deltime:TIMESTAMP#, MODAL = #modal:DECIMAL#, DOCRELTIME = #docreltime:TIMESTAMP#, DOCCHANNEL = #docchannel:DECIMAL#, DOCFLAG = #docflag:DECIMAL#, DOCKIND = #dockind:DECIMAL#, SITEID = #siteid:DECIMAL#, SRCSITEID = #srcsiteid:DECIMAL#, LIFESTATUS = #lifestatus:DECIMAL#, DOCCRUSER = #doccruser:VARCHAR#, HITSCOUNT = #hitscount:DECIMAL#, COMMENTCOUNT = #commentcount:DECIMAL#, COLLECTCOUNT = #collectcount:DECIMAL#, CRUSERID = #cruserid:DECIMAL#, COMPLETESCORE = #completescore:DECIMAL#, CRYSCORE = #cryscore:DECIMAL#, ALLSCORE = #allscore:DECIMAL#, TRANSCOUNT = #transcount:DECIMAL#, INFORMTYPE = #informtype:DECIMAL#, DOCSCORE = #docscore:DECIMAL# where CHNLDOCID = #chnldocid:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select:
select docid from IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK
order by $orderByClause$

select * from irp_chnl_doc_link
order by $orderByClause$

select chnldocid,channelid,docid,siteid,DOCTITLE,MODAL,CRUSER,DOCPUBTIME,DOCSTATUS,CRTIME from irp_chnl_doc_link
order by $orderByClause$

select CHNLDOCID,CHANNELID,DOCID,SITEID,DOCTITLE,CRUSER,DOCPUBTIME,DELUSER,DELTIME from IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK
order by $orderByClause$

select * from IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.update: update irp_chnl_doc_link set channelid=#chanid# where channelid = #channelid#
sqlMap.select: select distinct channelid from irp_chnl_doc_link where channelid = #channelid:value#
select chnldocid from irp_chnl_doc_link where docid=#value#
sqlMap.update: update irp_chnl_doc_link set DOCSTATUS=#status# where chnldocid =#chnldocid#
sqlMap.select: select docstatus from irp_chnl_doc_link where chnldocid=#value#
select chnldocid from irp_chnl_doc_link where doctitle=#value#
select chnldocid ,DOCTITLE from irp_chnl_doc_link where channelid=#value# and docstatus <0 order by docorder desc
select count(1) from irp_chnl_doc_link
select count(1) from irp_chnl_doc_link
select count(1) from irp_chnl_doc_link
select count(1) from irp_chnl_doc_link
select * where docid=#value#

select irp_chnl_doc_link.channelid as CHANNELID,irp_chnl_doc_link.docpubtime, irp_chnl_doc_link.doctitle as DOCTITLE, irp_document.docabstract as DOCABSTRACT, irp_chnl_doc_link.docid as DOCID from irp_chnl_doc_link left join irp_document on irp_chnl_doc_link.docid=irp_document.docid where irp_chnl_doc_link.docpubtime in ( select max(irp_chnl_doc_link.docpubtime) from irp_chnl_doc_link where irp_chnl_doc_link.channelid in(select channelid from irp_channel where chnltype=#value#) ) and irp_chnl_doc_link.channelid in(select channelid from irp_channel where chnltype=#value#)

select * from irp_chnl_doc_link
order by $orderByClause$

select count(1) from irp_chnl_doc_link
order by $orderByClause$

select b.informid as INFORMID, b.userid as USERID, b.informcontent as INFORMCONTENT, b.crtime as JUBAOTIME, t.informvalue as INFORMVALUE, d.* from irp_chnl_doc_link d , irp_inform b , irp_inform_type t where b.informnameid=d.docid and b.informkey=t.informkey and d.siteid in (select siteid from irp_site where ( sitetype=#sitetype1# $rightsql1$ ) or( sitetype=#sitetype2# $rightsql2$ )) and b.informtype=#informtype:DECIMAL# and b.informstatus=#informstatus:DECIMAL# $expert$
order by b.crtime desc

select count(1) from irp_chnl_doc_link d , irp_inform b , irp_inform_type t where b.informnameid=d.docid and b.informkey=t.informkey and d.siteid in (select siteid from irp_site where ( sitetype=#sitetype1# $rightsql1$ ) or ( sitetype=#sitetype2# $rightsql2$ )) and b.informtype=#informtype:DECIMAL# and b.informstatus=#informstatus:DECIMAL# $expert$ order by b.crtime desc
sqlMap.update: update irp_chnl_doc_link set docscore = (case when docscore is not null then docscore else 0 end)+#docscore:DECIMAL# where DOCID = #docid:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK.DOCID, IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK.DOCTITLE, IRP_DOCRECOMMEND.RECOMMEND, IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK.COMMENTCOUNT, IRPUSER.USERID, IRPUSER.USERNAME, IRPUSER.TRUENAME, IRPUSER.NICKNAME, IRPUSER.SEX, IRPUSER.USERPIC FROM IRP_DOCRECOMMEND LEFT JOIN IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK ON(IRP_DOCRECOMMEND.DOCID=IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK.DOCID) LEFT JOIN IRP_CHANNEL ON(IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK.CHANNELID=IRP_CHANNEL.CHANNELID) LEFT JOIN IRP_USER IRPUSER ON(IRP_DOCRECOMMEND.CRUSERID=IRPUSER.USERID) WHERE IRPUSER.STATUS=#userstatus:DECIMAL# AND IRP_DOCRECOMMEND.REPLAYUSERID=0 AND IRP_CHANNEL.SITEID=#siteid:DECIMAL# AND IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK.DOCSTATUS=#docstatus:DECIMAL# AND IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK.CHANNELID>0
$extChnlSQL$
$extDocSQL$
ORDER BY IRP_DOCRECOMMEND.CRTIME DESC

select CHNLDOCID, CHANNELID, DOCID, DOCTITLE, DOCORDER, DOCSTATUS, CRUSER, CRTIME, DOCPUBTIME, DOCPUBURL, DOCORDERPRI, INVALIDTIME, DELUSER, DELTIME, MODAL, DOCRELTIME, DOCCHANNEL, DOCFLAG, DOCKIND, SITEID, SRCSITEID, LIFESTATUS, DOCCRUSER, HITSCOUNT, COMMENTCOUNT, COLLECTCOUNT, CRUSERID, COMPLETESCORE, CRYSCORE, ALLSCORE, TRANSCOUNT, INFORMTYPE, DOCSCORE from IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK where DOCSTATUS=#docstatus:DECIMAL# AND MODAL=#doctype:DECIMAL# AND CHANNELID > 0 AND SITEID=#siteid:DECIMAL# AND INFORMTYPE=#notinform:DECIMAL# AND $chnlIdExt$
$chnlRightExt$
$docRightExt$
CHANNELID=#channelid:DECIMAL#
EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM IRP_INFORM WHERE IRP_INFORM.INFORMTYPE=#essInformType:DECIMAL# AND IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK.DOCID=IRP_INFORM.INFORMNAMEID ) ORDER BY ( select count(1) from IRP_INFORM where IRP_INFORM.INFORMTYPE=#essInformType:DECIMAL# AND IRP_CHNL_DOC_LINK.DOCID=IRP_INFORM.INFORMNAMEID
IRP_INFORM.CRTIME > #beginDate:TIMESTAMP#
IRP_INFORM.CRTIME < #endDate:TIMESTAMP#
) DESC
ORDER BY HITSCOUNT DESC
